Sega Mega Drive Classics jest kompilacją ponad pięćdziesięciu klasycznych produkcji, które zadebiutowały na konsoli Sega Mega Drive ( znanej też jako Sega Genesis ). 

Zestaw pojawił się między innymi na platformie PS4, PC i XONE.

Na potrzeby kompilacji przygotowano specjalne menu stylizowane na pokój gracza z lat dziewięćdziesiątych XX wieku.

Poza tym autorzy wzbogacili całość o możliwość zapisu gry w dowolnym momencie, a także o stanowiący dodatkowe wyzwanie tryb Mirror Mode, w którym obraz jest przerzucony w poziomie.

SEGA Mega Drive and Genesis Classics - это самая, что ни на есть классика. Отличный эмулятор Сеги, в котором не надо париться с установками, разбирательством во всяких ROM'ах, всё идеально работает на современных системах.
Конечно игра не сможет перенести вас в ваше детство (хотя может и сможет), но поиграть в разные классические тайтлы точно даст.
Конечно официальны игр тут на самом деле не очень много, но эту ситуацию спасает Мастерская, в которую геймеры залили огромнейшее количество разнообразных олдскульных проектов.

Это приложение хорошо именно своей простотой и оптимизацией - ты просто запускаешь игру, выбираешь тайтл и проходишь. Идеально для фанатов.

[h1]Recomendação de Simulador de Mega Drive para PC[/h1]

[i]Se você é fã de jogos retrô e quer reviver a nostalgia dos clássicos do Mega Drive, um simulador é a melhor solução![/i] Este software permite rodar jogos icônicos diretamente no seu computador, com a possibilidade de configurar controles, gráficos e som para uma experiência personalizada.

184227035.review:
SEGA's decision to fully delist the Mega Drive and Genesis Classics is deeply disappointing and a blow to retro gaming fans. As of December 6, 2024, SEGA has removed the entire Mega Drive and Genesis Classics collection from Steam, along with all individual titles. This means that new players can no longer purchase these beloved retro games on Steam, and I won’t be able to play them with friends in the future.

This action not only restricts access to one of the very nice curated collections of retro games but also disrespects the preservation of gaming history. I have fond memories of these games and valued the ability to revisit them through this collection. Now, future generations are being denied that opportunity unless they turn to expensive physical copies or piracy.

While SEGA did provide a one-month notice, this was far too short for fans to react, especially for such a significant delisting. They could have extended the availability period or ensured a more gradual transition, allowing more players to secure these classics. Transparency and a stronger commitment to game preservation should have been prioritized.

SEGA has taken a step backward in supporting its fans and preserving its legacy. This decision deserves criticism. I will rethink twice before buying any games from this company again.

183697424.review:
Post-delisting review here.

SEGA Mega Drive and Genesis Classics collection boasted over 60 Sega Genesis titles to play, from the original Sonic the Hedgehog to Alex Kidd, Toejam & Earl, Dynamite Headdy and even the Streets of Rage games. You can either choose to play these games via a standard menu selection, or from a bedroom setting including controller support.

There is one gripe that I have about this collection and it's that the emulation quality isn't great. Even running on a Steam Deck the games can stutter every now and then. If you're one of those who prefers to play Genesis games officially, this would be the way to go if you don't have access to the original console, but if you prefer better quality and don't care about legal issues, I'd recommend going with Genesis GX Plus. Hopefully Sega's reasoning about delisting this collection is to have a better functioning one in the future.

183693429.review:
Quel bonheur que cette compilation, je retombe en enfance et j'y entraine mes enfants avec moi. des jeux qui se suffisent à eux-même et dont la rejouabilité est indéniable malgré les années, les décennies qui passent.

Dommage que cela soit délisté de Steam au 6 déembre 2024 mais j'ai cru comprendre que SEGA préparait quelque chose (remakes? console (j'y crois peu)) et voulait reprendre la main mise sur tout ses petits... 

Pour vous qui ne connaîtrez donc pas ces pépites des années 80 et 90, désolé.

Sauf si vous passez par d'autres chemins qui permettent d'y jouer, compilations diverses sur d'autres supports, émulations, console d'origine ou autre.

Je ne saurai que trop vous invitez à entrer dans ce monde, car c'est cela :
- une porte d'entrée sur une partie du caviar des jeux vidéo historiques pour les nouveaux venus,
- la meilleure des initiation pour les plus jeunes,
- un vent de nostalgie pour les plus âgés.
